channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Every time I try to start half life, portal or gmod i get this error: [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb142/lordbost/Fuckinerror.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb142/lordbost/Fuckinerror2.jpg[/img]
Anyone know what I can do to fix this?

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @_Sonic _Sonic
item.description:
@_Sonic wrote:

That made perfect sense to me…

Read full topic

oh, i get it now… I thought you were missing a comma.

The reason you need to be banned is because you are another fourm idiot.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:9, topic:209676”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=276148.msg2254717#msg2254717 date=1212320040]

If your Internet symbol has a red X (the symbol in the taskbar) hl2.exe wont work. Happened to me , I reinstalled Vista it worked. You could also try restarting your modem. Or if your using WiFi just disable it for about 1 minute then enable it again.

you downloaded a css illegally, and it had the hl2.exe file with it

You dont know what your talking about.

yes i do, i downloaded an illegal css and that happened…

You have been reported to the FBI

Gud 4 u

Your another person who needs to be banned.

Why, because I download games that cost lots?
I do buy a game or movie once in a while.
[/quote]
The game is like 20$. Your just an 8 year old faggot who fucking lives off their parents.[/quote]
Im 14 you tard. I pay for all my stuff. So, if stuff costs lots and I have no money, I use utorrent, not my parents wallet.

@Cain_
Cause I live in NZ does not mean I am Maori.

Read full topic
